div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio
die mensis Junij Anno quosupra

The said day Thome garuok and' Symone murray was conuict be
ane suorne assis' schir Johnne Ruthirfurd' forspekar for the tribulance
of patry fforbes ffor the quhilkis thai war in ane amerciament of the
court and' to amend as law will and' forbeir in tyme to cum And'
the said patry quyt of ale tribulance of the saidis thomas and'
Symon' et cetera

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne Kintor
forspekar that catte movat sale serue henry reid' vnto the tyme sande
blinseill preiwe one friday that nixt cummis that scho was his
seruand' feit obefor henry Red' for this Instant yer'

The said day comperit Williame cheishame befor the alderman'
and' bailyes sitand in Jugement and exponit how Johnne
of Cullan tuk to preiwe the iij li' clamyt be the said William
assignit to him for his keill hir withtin x dais eftir the hame
cumin of Robert moises and' William boll and' protestit that
quhat was done tharuntill suld' turne him to na preiudice
vnto the tyme he war present in propir persone'
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die Junij anno quo supra

The said' day the wif of cristj prat come Souerte be hirs hande to pay
to Dauy fynne v s' at mertimes next to cum for ellene myr' for demi ane
yeris maile fee becaus' scho feit hir' with the said' Dauid' wyff

The said' day Anny brois' was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Dauy blinsele
forspekar for tribulance of katherine leche for the quhilkis scho was in ane
amerciament of the court et cetera And' gif euere scho offendis to the said' Katherine or
ony vthir and beis conuict' tharof scho sa

The said' day Androw stratoune preuit with Jonhne Cuk Officiar' that he Andrew stratoune
hed' gert Rede the hous' sett to him be patry chernsid' one flitting friday
last bigane at commavnd' of the balyeis

The said' day Dauy straloche grauntit at commavnd' of the aldirman to pay
to gavane of murray thre li' vij s' and vj d' alsone as it cane be gottin
In fra thame that ar' aving money for the ber' and meile bocht fra the fremmyt
men'

The said' day patry chernsid' grantit to ansuer' for margaret prat to the Relict
of vmquhile Androw Cullane anent ane pendes' of ane Siluerit tuschay

The said' day Robert gorpunding grauntit him aving to Androw Cullane vij
bollis of malt the quhilkis the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme
of law And' atour he grauntit him to pay alsmekil maile for the berne
as Johne mvnk wile mak fatht

The said' day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that Alexander blinsele failyeit in his preiwe anent the feing of Caty movat
et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem viij die mensis Junij anno
quo supra

head.add: Statut' for the kepin the the tone fra strange seknes

div.p:
The said day It was Statut and ordanit be the prouest ballieis ande Counsale for'
the conseruing of the toune fra the contagious' seknes of pestlence That thir salbe sexten'
personis chosin be thame to wache the toune tharof viij in the day and viij in the nicht
and Ilke persone sale haue vj d' in the day that wachis and vj d' in the nicht quhilkis mo
ney the personis that awe to wache sal pay euere day as it Circualie gais about in
the toune Nochtwithtstanding quhat persone that suld' wache and he be habile tharto be the sicht of
the bailye and officiar' of the quartar may wache for him self and be fre of the pament of the
money And' atour gif ony persone that suld' wache dissobeis and wile nocht wache na
pay the said' wagis sal pay viij s' for the amerciament of the court to the balyeis ij li'
wax to the haly blud licht vnforgevin and sale be conuict for brekin of common' ordinance And'
thir salbe iiijor portis oppin' in the day that is to say the port of the castalhill the
port of the gallowgat the port of the skulhill the port of the grene and tua
portis oppin and wachit in the nicht that is to say the porte of the skulhile and the
port of the grene and the tothir tua portis closit and lokit Alsua Ilkan mane and woman
sale vpmak and byg thar bak dikis Sufficientlie as efferis with iij dais vndir
the pane of xl s' And' gif the lardis of that landis be vteuthe the burghe the
tennentis in thar malis And' Ilkan balye sale pas' with his officiar throw his
quartar and charge and commavnd' ale personis gif thar happinis ony seknes in thir hous'
thai sale warne the officiaris tharof And' that nane vesy vthir except the Curat vndir
the pane of bannisin the toune And' gif ony persone happinnis to be sek or suspectit
with seknes and be chargit to Reman in thar hous' and contempnis and dissobeis salbe
bannist the toune for ane yer' Alsua the balyeis sal pas' nychtlie with his officiar'
Sett and stabile the weche Item the toune salbe Redy at commavnd of the prouest
and balyeis to pas' and big the placis that ar' nedfule to be bigit et cetera And' that
nay persone hous' herbry nor Reset nay person but leif of the prouest and
balyeis And' the fischearis sale bring ale thar fische to the mercat and sele nay
fische bot in the mercat vndir the pane of eschetis And' the balyeis sale ches'
the mast habill personis to the kepin' of futy And' thir pontis to be kepit vndir
the pane of brekin of common' ordinance

The said' day William still was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Dauid menyeis
forspekar for tribulance of Johne Ratre thomas Waus and Duncane Colison'
commissaris Ande the assis' that passit one the debatis betuix him and Duncane
Waldy et cetera within the toune of the weiris for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament
of the Court et cetera Ande the Johne Ratre was quyt of ale tribulance of the said'
Williame et cetera

The said day Androw burnat skynner grauntit him wand to Williame colly
vij s' vsuale money of scotland quhilkis the bailyes chargit him to pay within
terme of lawe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die Junij anno
quo supra

The said' day Johne red' was chargit be the prouest and balyeis to pay to
Duncane gilrutht tene s' Scottis money within terme of law quhilkis was aving
to the said' Duncane be his avne graunt

The said' day patry Red' grauntit him lauchfullie warnit to Comper befor the prouest and balyeis
one friday the xxvj day of the monetht of June Instant in the balye court to be haldin within
the tolbutht to ansur' tile ane breiwe of richt Impetrat be William forbes of towns et cetera

Decimonono die mensis Junij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo Sexto dominus Andreas troup fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit patricium leslie burgensis burgi de Abirdene suum verum legitimum et Indubitatem procuratorem actorem factorem et mandatum
specialem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam Integram et plenariam presentatem ac mandatum speciale pro se
et nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Willelmo scherar' tinctor' burgensis dicti burgi se vlnas et
dimidium vlne le worset et Se quatuo solidos et vj d' monete scocie sibi debito et de Receptis
acquietandum Et si necesse fuerit prefatum Willelmum Coram preposito et balliuis dicti burgi pro premiss' prosequendum
agendum defendendum et cetera promittens de Rato et grato cum ceteris termes et clausulis necessariis
et oportunis et cetera Coram Willelmo colp et Alexandro stabillar'
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimonono die mensis Junij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes Adam fyf conuictus fuit per Dauid menyes Johannem ruthirfurd' militem Johannem Colison'
Alexandrum mar' Robertum Crag Willelmum futhes thomam leslie thomam Waus Duncanum Colysone Willelmum
blakhale patricium Red' Alexandrum malisone Willelmum Colp Dauid mar' et Robertum Waus comburgenses dicti burgi Juratos
in assisam pro perturbio Johannis Cullane cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt ex ore

Eodem die Johannes Cullane conuictus fuit pro leui perturbio Ade fyf ex ore Dauid menyeis prelocutoris dicte
assise Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Adam fyf conuictus fuit per dictum assisam ex ore Dauid menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio
Walterj Cullane Cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt et Idem Walterus quitus de perturbio ipsius Ade

Eodem die Johannes Cullane quitus fuit per dictam assisam ex ore Dauid menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem
de clameo intromissione et Recepcionis vnius Salmonis a Duncano fyff

head.add: Adam fyf wellis gent law bewmond' Paule

div.p:
The said' day Adam fyf William Wellis Johne law Johne gent nichole bevmond' and
gilbert paule was conuict be ane Suorne assis' forsaid' Dauid menyeis forspekar
for the wranguis' Intrometing and avay takin of Sex lax salmond' fysche fra Johnnez
of Cullane for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane amerciament of the court and to Amend'
as law will et cetera

The said' day It was deliuerit and statut be the aldirman and Counsale that ony of mastiris of
the fyschingis of the Raik or ony vthiris wattiris of Dee and Done that fyndis ony fische
vnpartit diuidit or distribut be the mastiris in ony place passand' fra the said' wattiris
hid' or concelit sal tak the said' fysche and Intromett with thame to the vys and profit
of him and his nychtbouris partismen of the said' fischingis

Eodem die Andreas Cullane deuenit plegius legalis quod Adam fyf and Duncanus fyf erunt Inde
mpnes pro Johanne Cullan aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes ruthirfurd' miles deuenit
plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnes pro dictis Adam et Duncano aliter
quam per viam Juris et obligatur per manus certas et bona hincinde Et prefate partes obligatur
ad releuandum suos plegios de huiusmodi fideiussione

The said' day It was ordanit and deliuerit be the Counsale that ser Williame
Coupar sale pay tuenty Schillingis to Thome chamer seruand' In the queir'
In siclik wys as he pait it to Johne fyf quhen he brukit the quartar clerk
schip of the towne Ande gif he refus' and wile nocht to be dischargit of ale
thingis that he has of the toune

The said day Johne of cullan and William cheishame was oblist and Suorne the
gret aithe to stand and Abid' at the finale decret deliuerance and finale ordinance of
patry leslie Thomas leslie Alexander gay Duncan Colisone and thomas Waus
arbitouris and Amicable componitouris chosin betuix tham anent the thre li' debatabile
betuix the said' and ale thingis contenit in the act' concerning the said' thre li'

The said' day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauy menyeis forspekar that Johne
arthour' sale haue the maile of the Inland' of his lande bocht fra William blinsele of this terme
of Witsonday bigane and he sale pay ane franche crovne to the said' Williame
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis Junij anno quo supra

head.add: george talyour for brekin of common' ordinance

div.p:
The said' day george talyour' was conuict be the haile Counsale present for the tyme for the
breking of commone ordinance in the Intaking of land' mene agan the statutis and ordinance
of the toune for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the Court and to Amend' as law
wile and to amend as law wile and forber' in tyme to cum

The said' day Dauy blinsele was conuict be the Counsale present for the tyme fo the Ressat of
the lard' of Cultir agan the statutis and commone ordinance of the toune et cetera for the quhilkis he
was in ane Amerciament of the Court and to amende as law wile et cetera Atour it was statut'
and deliuerit be the Counsale that gif the said' Dauy happinis to brek the statutus and common'
ordinance of the toune In tyme to Cum and beis conuict tharof he sale tyne ale thingis
that he has of the toune
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis Junij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd miles Johannes Cullane Andreas Cullane Johannes Colisone thomas
leslie thomas Waus Andreas fyf Duncanus Colisone patricius leslie Dauid mar' matheus
branche Willelmus Wormet Richardus Waus Johannes andirsone Dauid Adamsone Johannes
grig Dauid fynne William stevinsone cheishame and Andreas Stevinson' burgenses dicti burgi
Jurati dicunt quod quondam Alexander Sanquhar' pater mariorie sanquhare latricis presencium obiit
vltra vestitus et Sasitus et vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de terris et annuo
Redditu subcriptis Jacente infra dictum burgum videlicet de vna terra Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Johannis Sancler' ex australi ex vna et terram Robertj
Crag ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens
Et de vna terra jacente in vico Inferiore ecclesie ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter J terram
Jacobi Kennerty ex orientali ex vna et Communionem venellam ex occidentali partibus ab altera
Et de vno annuo Redditu vndecim solidorum et iiijor d' de terra quondam Alexander Wilsone
Jacente in vico de le Skulhill ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Alexandrum crag
ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis moir' ex occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem viam
regiam versus anstrum extenden' in longitudine ad latum dicti burgi versus boream
Et de quadam terra Jacente in le grene inter terram quondam Johannis gregory ex australi ex vna
et terram Andree philpsone ex boreali partibus ab altera Et de vno Orto Jacente ad
finem orientalem dicte terre quondam torrente inter terram quondam gilberti moresone
ex boreali et communionem viam regiam ex australi et torrentem versus oriens et aqueductum
molendinorum versus occidens Et quod dicta marioria est vna de legitimis et propinquioribus heredibus
dicti quondam Alexandri patris suj de dictis terris orto et annuis Redditu cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legitime etatis Et quod dicte terre et ortus cum pertinenciis valent nunc per annum quadraginta s' et
valuerunt viginti s' tempore pacis Et valor annuj Redditus patet in se Et
Et quod dicti terre annuus Redditus et ortus cum suis pertinenciis inter tenentur in capite de Supprimo
domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod dicta terra Jacente in vico furcarum inter terras
quondam Johannis Sanclar' et Robertj crag annuus Redditus et ortus cum suis pertinenciis nunc
existit' In manibus domini nostri Regis ob decessum dicti quondam aAlexander patris sui per spacium
annorum aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiuscumque minime prosequentis Et quod
dicta terra Jacente in vico inferiore ecclesie cum pertinenciis inter existit In manibus margarete
Waus Relicte quondam dicte Alexander Sanquhar racione coniuncte Infeodaconis pro toto tempore
vite sue Et quod dicta terra Jacente in le grene cum suis pertinenciis nunc existit
In manibus Katherine Coutis Relicte quondam Duncanj makalloun' racione coniuncte
infeodacioni pro totos tempore vite sue datis et clausulis sub Sigillo dicti
balliui ac Sigillis quorundum qui huic Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum anno die mense
et loco prenotatis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod Joneta Sanquhar filia et vna heredum dicti quondam dicti Alexander
desuper et tenetur herede suum Retornatum ut supra

The said day James young in the peris of balheluy was conuict' be the said assis' ale in ane
woice concordand for tribulance of alane litstar in his avin hous for q the quhilk he was in ane
amerciament of the court and' to amend as law will and forbeir in tyme to cum et cetera And' the said
allane quyt of ale tribulance of the said James

The said day James younge was conuict' for the tribulance of the burgh' of Abirdene be the said assis'
for the quhilk he was in ane amerciament of the court and to amend as law will and' forbeir'
in tyme to cum et cetera

The said day Alexander moir was conuict be the said' assis' for tribulance of findelaw Wobstar
And' the said findelawe for tribulance of the said Alexander moir ffor the quhilk
Ilkane of thame was in ane amerciament of the court And' to amend' as law will
and' forbeir in tyme tocum et cetera

The said day the wif of Alexander moir was conuict be the said assis' for tribulance of
findelaw Wobstar and' his wif And' the wif of the qu said findelaw for tribulance
of the said Alexander moir and' his wif ffor the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane
amerciament of the court And' to amend as lawe will and' forbeir in tyme to cum

the said day the said James yong one that ane part and allan litstar one that vthir part
was bindin and' oblist be the faithtis of thar bodijs to stand and' abid at the deliuerance
of the assis' befor writin for the tribulance done to the said allan quhilkis riply auisit
ordanit the said' James to syt fone one his kne and' ask the said allan forgevnis In
presence of the court And' to cum one sanct Johnis day nixt heireftir with ane walx candile
in Ilkane hand at sanct Johnne the baptist altar within the paris kirk of the said burgh'
at x houris befor none and J ask the prouest in the tovnis Name forgevnes And' the
said allan forgevnis for the offence committit to the said toune and' to the said allan And'
offir the said candillis to the haly blud licht And his hand to be put in the goif at
the will of the said allan

The said day Alexander blair was conuict be the said assis' for tribulance of alane
litstar for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and' to amend' as law
will and' forbeir in in tyme to cum And' the said alan quyt of ale tribulance of
the said Alexander blair et cetera

Eodem die Johannes cullan deuenit plegij legales per manus et bona quod Jacobus yong
in balheluy erit Indempnis pro alano litstar aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas
Irod plegios legales pro Jure per manus et bona quod dictus allanus erit Indempnis
pro dicto Jacobo aliter quam per viam Juris et cetera Et dictos partes obligantur ad releuandum
dictos suos plegios per manus et bona et cetera

Eodem die Johannes colisone pl deuenit plegius legalis per manus et bona quod findelaus
Wobstar erit Indempnis pro Alexandro moir aliter quam per viam Juris Et patricius lesly deuenit
plegius legalis per manus et bona quod dictus findelaius erit Indempnes pro dicto Alexandro
aliter quam per viam Juris Et dicti partes obligantur ad releuendum suos plegios per manus
et bona et cetera

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne arthour forspekar that the borgh' fundin
one thomas lammyntone be Johnne Raburne for the skaithting of him in the settin of his stokis
apone the said Johnez maling was fundin availe for the quhilkis the said thomas was in
ane amerciament of the court And' to Amend as law will and forbeir in tyme to cum And' or
danit the said thomas to ramuf his stok of the said Johnez maling
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die mensis Junij anno quo supra

The said day Duncan Soutar Androw logy gilbert monrow gelis monrow kelow thome
auche and gilbert fraser quhit fischearis was conuict be ane Suorne assis' ser johne
ruthirfurd' forspekar for the wranguis' slauchtir of Salmonde fische in the havinmovtht
and stoppin of thame to Cum within the wattiris vsuale for fischingis in Dee and Done to gret
dampnage and skatht of the assedacionaris and takismen' of the saide wattiris and for the
quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amende as law
wile and forber in tyme to Cum
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die mensis Junij anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de Abirdene coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyes preposito Jacobo Colysone et Alexandro
gray duobus balliuorum In pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti vicesimo Sexto die mensis Junij
anno domini Millesimo quinquagesimo sexto per subscriptum Dauid menyeis de petfodellis Johannem leslie de Warderis
Johannem ruthirfurde militem Andream fyf thomam Wode Patricium leslie Andream stratoun' Alexandrum
prat cristinum prat Dauid Kintor Symonem elloun' matheum branche Alexandrum hay Johannem ramsay
Johannem craik Walterum honysone et patricium Andirsone burgenses dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt
quod quondam Willelmus buchane frater thome buchane latoris presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus
ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vno annuo Redditu decim solidorum monete
scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali
part eiusdem vici inter terram Normanj blinsele ex australi ex vna et terram quondam dicti Willelmi
buchane ex boreali partibus per ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens
Et quod dictus thomas est legitimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Willelmi fratris suj de dicta
terra annuo Redditu cum pertinenciis et quod est legitime etatis Et quod terre in capite de Supprimo domino
nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus Suppremj domini nostri Regis
per decessum dicti quondam Willelmi fratris suj per Spacium dimidij annj et vnius mensis
aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiuscumque minime prosequentis datis et clausis

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionj Curie quod Jacobus Knollis est legitimus et
propinquior heres quondam Johannes Knollis patris suj et cetera
